title: What if Blitz's current W was replaced by a rocket powered leap?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/3ARH2Gn.png/img

Basically giving up a movement speed increase (that then becomes a decrease for a bit) + attack speed increase for a rocket propelled leap (like flash in a way for example sake)

######Sauce where I got this from -

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1e2xApDeRok
